amendment.description: To facilitate the utilization of United States commercial remote sensing space capabilities for filling imagery and geospatial information requests.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3722 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3722 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10351) To facilitate the utilization of United States commercial remote sensing space capabilities for filling imagery and geospatial information requests.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3722 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3722 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Allard.
